actionPack.name: CouchDB
actionPack.description: Integration actions for the CouchDB NoSQL document database.
actionPack.author: CA Technologies

RESTAction.name: CouchDB - Update Document
RESTAction.description: Update a document in a CouchDB database.

inputParamList.name: user
inputParamList.description: The user to use in order to authenticate with CouchDB.

inputParamList.name: password
inputParamList.description: The password to use in order to authenticate with CouchDB.

inputParamList.name: Protocol
inputParamList.description: Connection protocol to the CouchDB server.

inputParamList.name: Host
inputParamList.description: The host to connect to CouchDB on.

inputParamList.name: Port
inputParamList.description: The numeric port that CouchDB is running on.

inputParamList.name: Database Name
inputParamList.description: The name of the database to update.

inputParamList.name: Id
inputParamList.description: The Id of the document to update.

inputParamList.name: Revision
inputParamList.description: Revision of the document to update.

inputParamList.name: Fields
inputParamList.description: Comma separated array of fields with their values (e.g. "name": "value").

outputParamList.name: Execution Output
outputParamList.description: Standard out from the command execution.
